description: Crewe Alexandra centre-back George Ray signs a new two-year contract with the League One club.
title: George Ray: Crewe Alexandra defender extends contract
title_page: George Ray: Crewe Alexandra defender extends contract - BBC Sport
maintext:
Crewe Alexandra centre-back George Ray has signed a new two-year contract with the League One club.
He has agreed a deal that will keep him with the Alex until the summer of 2017.
Ray, 21, who has won two Wales Under-21 caps, made his debut at Wembley as a late substitute in Crewe's Johnstone's Paint Trophy final win in 2013.
Crewe have also completed the signing of midfielder Ryan Wintle from non-league neighbours Alsager Town on an 18-month professional deal.
